title: NFT Sales Witness 23% Decline This Week, Ethereum Dominates With $130 Million in Sales
description: During the first week of H2 2023, non-fungible token (NFT) sales witnessed a 23.39% decline compared to the previous week, marking a two-week downward trend. A total of $195.95 million worth of NFT sales occurred, with Ethereum-based NFTs accounting for $130.77 million. NFT Sales Take a Hit: Week-Over-Week Drop of 23% in the First Week […]
